articles.description: Universal Century 0079. During the war of independence declared by the Principality of Zeon, the Earth Federation Forces have found themselves outgunned. To counter this, the Federation has developed new mobile suits and tested them at Side 7. Zeon Lieutenant…

articles.title: Mobile Suit Gundam (Sub) - Episode 37 - Char and Sayla
articles.description: The Gundam is disabled, and the White Base crew head out to search for it. Amid this, Char and Sayla meet again. Char's real name is Casval, and Sayla's is Artesia. The two are the orphaned children of the late Zeon Zum Deikun, who first pioneered the Newtype…

articles.title: Mobile Suit Gundam (Dub) - Episode 41 - Space Fortress: A Baoa Qu
articles.description: The colony laser weapon Solar Ray utterly disintegrates Sovereign Degwin Zabi, General Revil, and half of the Federation's main fleet. The Federation Forces' command structure and fighting strength are thrown into disarray, but the surviving fleet regroups an…

articles.title: Mobile Suit Gundam (Dub) - Episode 36 - The Duel in Texas
articles.description: The White Base heads for the debris field known as the Texas Zone. However, Captain M'Quve plots to take down the Gundam to win favor with his superior Kycilia Zabi. At the same time, Lalah is testing the new mobile armor Elmeth, with Char observing nearby. M…

articles.title: Mobile Suit Gundam (Dub) - Episode 31 - Breakthrough
articles.description: Captain Char asks his former subordinate Lieutenant Dren to intercept the White Base. Sleggar sorties in a G-Fighter, while a Rick Dom formation begins its attack. As Dren focuses on the fleet battle, he hears a report that the Gundam is missing and becomes u…

articles.title: Mobile Suit Gundam (Dub) - Episode 27 - Across the Atlantic Ocean
articles.description: The stowaway Miharu is discovered by Kai, who hides her in his own room. Immediately after he gives Miharu some information, Char's subordinate Flanagan Boone visits the ship and contacts Miharu. After watching the children on the White Base get caught up in …

articles.title: Mobile Suit Gundam (Sub) - Episode 28 - Tragedy in Jaburo
articles.description: The White Base arrives at Jaburo, the Earth Federation Forces headquarters in South America, but it has been followed by the enemy Mad Angler unit. Char joins the first wave of the attack as a huge formation of Zeon forces appears in the skies over Jaburo. Co…

articles.title: Mobile Suit Gundam (Sub) - Episode 32 - Farewell in Side Six
articles.description: The White Base enters the neutral territory of Side 6. Inspector Cameron Bloom, who was engaged to Mirai, finds his warm reception met with cool indifference. Meanwhile, Amuro finds his lost father Tem. But Amuro's father seems to have suffered brain damage d…

articles.title: Mobile Suit Gundam (Dub) - Episode 24 - The Battle of Odessa
articles.description: In the middle of testing out the G-Fighter, Amuro witnesses a Federation plane taking off from Zeon territory. Amuro follows it to the mobile command ship Big Tray, and informs General Elran of the existence of a spy. The traitor general shows his true colors…

articles.title: Mobile Suit Gundam (Dub) - Episode 22 - Matilda's Rescue
articles.description: Ensnared in M'Quve's trap, the White Base makes an emergency landing. While the worried Mirai anxiously waits for resupply, Bright formally designates her as substitute captain. Meanwhile, General Revil has just arrived at the European frontline base. Holding…

articles.title: Mobile Suit Gundam (Sub) - Episode 23 - Black Tri-Star
articles.description: Matilda's return to the White Base raises the crew's morale, and they take a commemorative photo. The Doms of the Black Tri-Stars, however, are approaching the White Base. Sayla is chosen to be the pilot of the G-Armor, and sorties with the Gundam despite fee…

articles.title: Mobile Suit Gundam (Sub) - Episode 16 - Amuro Deserts
articles.description: Amuro is ordered to sortie in the Gundam, but he conceitedly decides to launch with the Guntank instead. Ral's Gouf appears before him, and the difference in fighting strength gives Amuro no other option but to retreat. Amuro switches to the Gundam and tries …

articles.title: Mobile Suit Gundam (Sub) - Episode 20 - Sorrow and Hatred
articles.description: After Ral's death, Crowley Hamon intends to complete their mission so that she can repay his affections. With the remains of her limited military force, she begins a "drill maneuver" to break through the weak spot in the White Base's defenses. Amuro senses th…
